subject: Madrid Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal defeated Roger Federer after Victoria Azarenka ended Julia Görges’s 10-match winning streak to reach the Madrid Open final against Petra Kvitova.
snippet: Rafael Nadal defeated Roger Federer after Victoria Azarenka ended Julia Görges’s 10-match winning streak to reach the Madrid Open final against Petra Kvitova.
